_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  ri!readOnly,
  rule!AS_CO_DSP_standardReadOnlyField(
    label: ri!label,
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    value: ri!value,
    labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    accessibilityText: ri!accessibilityText,
    align: ri!align
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: rule!AS_CO_UT_getLabelPosition(
      label: ri!label,
      labelPosition: ri!labelPosition,
      readOnly: false
    ),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpTooltip,
    placeholder: ri!placeholder,
    value: ri!value,
    /* We are using nested saveIntos to automatically perform a trim on any value */
    /* before executing the actual saves */
    /* Saves can be nested in this format to allow for better reusability */
    saveInto: a!save(ri!saveInto, trim(save!value)),
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    required: if(ri!readOnly, false, ri!required),
    /* Updated requiredMessage parameter to show default validation text*/
    requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage(
      label: ri!label,
      requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage
    ),
    readOnly: ri!readOnly,
    disabled: ri!disabled,
    masked: ri!masked,
    validations: if(
      ri!readOnly,
      {},
      a!flatten(
        {
          ri!validations,
          rule!AS_CO_VD_textValidation(value: ri!value, maxLength: ri!maxLength)
        }
      )
    ),
    validationGroup: ri!validationGroup,
    align: ri!align,
    accessibilitytext: ri!accessibilityText,
    refreshAfter: ri!refreshAfter,
    characterLimit: ri!characterLimit,
    showCharacterCount: ri!showCharacterCount,
    inputPurpose: ri!inputPurpose
  )
)

_a-0000edef-782d-8000-9e15-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!isWeightedFactorsRequired: a!defaultValue(ri!isWeightedFactorsRequired, false()),
  a!match(
    value: ri!context,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_FACTORS,
    then: 1,
    equals: cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_WEIGHTS,
    then: 2,
    whenTrue: and(
      not(local!isWeightedFactorsRequired),
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS
    ),
    then: 2,
    whenTrue: and(
      local!isWeightedFactorsRequired,
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_TEAMS
    ),
    then: 3,
    whenTrue: and(
      not(local!isWeightedFactorsRequired),
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_ASSIGNMENT
    ),
    then: 3,
    whenTrue: and(
      local!isWeightedFactorsRequired,
      fv!value = cons!AS_GSS_ENUM_UPDATE_EVALUATION_ACTION_ASSIGNMENT
    ),
    then: 4,
    default: 1
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_createOrUpdateEvaluationSteps
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  /*If isWeightedFactorsRequired is false skip the weights step in the evaluation wizard*/
  if(
    and(
      not(
        a!defaultValue(
          ri!evaluation.isWeightedFactorsRequired,
          true
        )
      ),
      ri!activeStep > 1
    ),
    ri!activeStep + 1,
    ri!activeStep
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationCriteriaSetup(
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    readOnly: ri!factorReadOnly,
    showSubFactorGrid: ri!showSubFactorGrid
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluationFactorWeights(
    bundle: ri!i18nData,
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_evaluatorTeam(
    evaluatorTeams: ri!evaluatorTeams,
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    readOnly: ri!evalTeamReadOnly,
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    evaluatorAliases: ri!evaluatorAliases
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_assignFactors(
    evaluationFactors: ri!evaluationFactors,
    evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    i18nData: ri!i18nData,
    evaluatorTeams: ri!evaluatorTeams,
    evaluation: ri!evaluation,
    userDetails: ri!userDetails
  )
)

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation
_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)

      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))

  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

    ),

        }

)

_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_INP_factorWeight
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_textField"(
  label: rule!AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel(
    bundle: ri!bundle,
    bundleKey: "acs_WeightPoints",
    arguments: {
      ri!factor.criteriaName,
      "points"
    }
  ),
  labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
  accessibilityText: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!factor.parentCriteriaId),
    "Values for factor weight points cannot exceed 100",
    "Values for subfactor weight points cannot exceed its corresponding factor weight"
  ),
  value: ri!factor.factorWeight,
  saveInto: {
    ri!factor.factorWeight,
    a!save(
      ri!isWeightAboveHundred,
      if(
        todecimal(
          save!value
        ) > cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS,
        true(),
        false()
      )
    ),
    a!save(
      ri!factor.factorWeight,
      a!match(
        value: todecimal(save!value),
        whenTrue: rule!AS_GSS_UT_isBlank(value: fv!value),
        then: fv!value,
        whenTrue: fv!value < 0,
        then: 0,
        whenTrue: fv!value > cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS,
        then: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS,
        default: round(fv!value, 2)
      )
    )
  },
  align: "RIGHT"
)

_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*Factor assignment row for each evaluation factors*/
a!localVariables(
  local!activeSubfactors: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
    field: "isActive",
    value: true
  ),
  local!activeEvaluatorTeam: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: ri!evaluatorTeams,
    field: "isActive",
    value: true
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!evaluationFactors[rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(values: true, array: ri!evaluationFactors.isActive)],
    expression: /*Factors*/
    a!localVariables(
      local!expand: true(),
      {
        /*Factor fields*/
        rule!AS_GSS_CPS_factorAssignmentFieldsLayout(
          evaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors,
          i18nData: ri!i18nData,
          evaluation: ri!evaluation,
          expandSubFactors: local!expand,
          currentEvaluationFactor: fv!item,
          userDetails: ri!userDetails,
          readOnly: ri!readOnly,
          activeEvaluatorTeams: local!activeEvaluatorTeam,
          activeEvaluationSubFactors: local!activeSubfactors
        ),
        /*Associated Sub factors*/
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnsLayout"(
          marginAbove: "MORE",
          marginBelow: "MORE",
          showWhen: local!expand,
          columns: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(width: "EXTRA_NARROW"),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_columnLayout"(
              contents: rule!AS_GSS_GRD_subFactorLayoutForAssignment(
                parentEvaluationFactor: fv!item,
                allEvaluationSubFactors: ri!evaluationSubFactors[rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(values: true, array: ri!evaluationSubFactors.isActive )],
                i18nData: ri!i18nData,
                evaluation: ri!evaluation,
                userDetails: ri!userDetails,
                readOnly: ri!readOnly,
                activeEvaluatorTeams: local!activeEvaluatorTeam
              )
            )
          }
        )
      }
    )
  )
)

      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentIds)
